title: Where can i download Firmware Reverse Analysis Konsole?
content:
where i can download the latest version of FRAK: firmware reverse analysis konsole; i cannot find the link; is anyhere a good example or tutorial of usage?
thanks a lot

answers_data.content:
It appears as though the tool was never released.
https://code.google.com/archive/p/frak/ has been empty since 2012, and merely points to http://frak.redballoonsecurity.com.
http://frak.redballoonsecurity.com has been down for a while, but the last time it was up merely said, "FRAK is currently undergoing internal code review for public release."
You can try to contact the author, though: [emailÂ protected]
OFRAK (Open Firmware Reverse Analysis Konsole) has now been released on https://ofrak.com/ and on GitHub.
